posts.post_title: WTB N172 St. Louis Browns Champions
posts.post_content:
Looking to work on building this OJ subset. 

I currently have the following:

Foutz 
Gleason
Nicol
O’Neill
Robinson

Let me know via DM what you have. Prefer graded but am ok with raw as well.
Good luck Danny—that’s a great subset.
